conduits.name: Divine Call
conduits.description: Divine Shield's remaining cooldown is reduced by 5 sec when you take damage. This effect can only occur once every <dynamic>30.0 sec - 15 sec</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Shielding Words
conduits.description: Casting Word of Glory grants you a shield that prevents damage equal to <dynamic>15.0% - 30%</dynamic> of the healing done by Word of Glory. Lasts 10 sec.

conduits.name: Golden Path
conduits.description: Consecration heals you for <dynamic>[200 / 100 * (5% of Attack power)] - [480 / 100 * (5% of Attack power)]</dynamic> every 1 sec while standing within it.

conduits.name: Stalwart as a Crusader
conduits.description: Crusader Aura reduces the duration of incoming Fear effects on your allies by <dynamic>30.0% - 60%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Light's Barding
conduits.description: Divine Steed's duration is increased by <dynamic>50.0% - 100%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Wrench Evil
conduits.description: Turn Evil's cast time is reduced by <dynamic>50% - 100%</dynamic>, and its range is increased by 10 yds.

conduits.name: Echoing Blessings
conduits.description: Blessing of Freedom increases the target's movement speed by <dynamic>5.0% - 12%</dynamic>. Blessing of Protection and Blessing of Sacrifice reduce the target's damage taken by <dynamic>5.0%</dynamic>. These effects linger for 8 sec after the Blessing ends.

conduits.name: Expurgation
conduits.description: Your Blade of Justice critical hits cause the target to burn for <dynamic>15.0% - 36%</dynamic> of the damage dealt every 2 sec for 6 sec.

conduits.name: Truth's Wake
conduits.description: Wake of Ashes burns the target for an additional <dynamic>15.0% - 36%</dynamic> damage over 6 sec.

conduits.name: Virtuous Command
conduits.description: Judgment grants you Virtuous Command for 6 sec, which gives your Templar's Verdict, Crusader Strike, Blade of Justice, and auto attacks a 40% chance to deal <dynamic>20.0% - 48%</dynamic> additional Holy damage.

conduits.name: Templar's Vindication
conduits.description: Templar's Verdict has a <dynamic>20.0% - 48%</dynamic> chance to strike again for 15% of its damage.

conduits.name: Enkindled Spirit
conduits.description: Aura Mastery increases the healing of your next 3 Light of Dawns by <dynamic>40.0% - 96%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Resplendent Light
conduits.description: Holy Light heals up to 5 targets within 8 yds for <dynamic>5.0% - 12%</dynamic> of its healing.

conduits.name: Focused Light
conduits.description: Holy Shock's critical effect chance is increased by <dynamic>5.0% - 12%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Untempered Dedication
conduits.description: Light of the Martyr's damage and healing is increased by <dynamic>5.0% - 5%</dynamic> each time it is cast. This effect can stack up to 5 times and lasts for 15 sec.

conduits.name: Vengeful Shock
conduits.description: Avenger's Shield causes your target to take <dynamic>15.0% - 45%</dynamic> increased Holy damage from you for 5 sec.

conduits.name: Punish the Guilty
conduits.description: Shield of the Righteous deals <dynamic>50% - 120%</dynamic> more damage to targets affected by Judgment.

conduits.name: Resolute Defender
conduits.description: Shield of the Righteous extends Ardent Defender's duration by <dynamic>25.0% - 25%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Royal Decree
conduits.description: Guardian of Ancient Kings's cooldown is reduced by <dynamic>15.0 sec - 30 sec</dynamic>, and casting it causes your next Word of Glory to cost no Holy Power.

conduits.name: The Long Summer
conduits.description: Blessing of Summer lasts <dynamic>30.0% - 60%</dynamic> longer.

conduits.name: Righteous Might
conduits.description: Vanquisher's Hammer deals <dynamic>100% - 250%</dynamic> increased damage, and heals you for the damage done.

conduits.name: Hallowed Discernment
conduits.description: Ashen Hallow strikes the lowest health ally and enemy within it an additional time for <dynamic>40.0% - 96%</dynamic> of its effect.

conduits.name: Ringing Clarity
conduits.description: Divine Toll has a <dynamic>40.0% - 96%</dynamic> chance to cast 2 extra time on the main target.

covenants.name: Summon Steward
covenants.description:
Call your steward to bring you a Phial of Serenity that can be consumed to restore 20% health and remove all Curse, Disease, Poison, and Bleed effects.

Your Steward additionally offers access to a selection of useful amenities for 4 min.

covenants.name: Purify Soul
covenants.description: Restores 20% health and removes all diseases, poisons, curses, and bleeds affecting you.

covenants.name: Soulshape
covenants.description:
Turn into a Vulpin, teleporting 15 yds forward and increasing your movement speed by 50%. You may reactivate Soulshape every few sec to teleport again.

Lasts 12 sec, or indefinitely while in a rest area.

covenants.name: Flicker
covenants.description: Teleports you forward 15 yds or until reaching an obstacle.

covenants.name: Fleshcraft
covenants.description:
Form a shield of flesh and bone over 4 sec that absorbs damage equal to 20% of your maximum health for 2 min.

Channeling near a corpse claims their essence to grow the shield, up to 50% of your maximum health. This is most effective against powerful enemies.

covenants.name: Door of Shadows
covenants.description: Wend through the shadows, appearing at the targeted location.

covenants.name: Divine Toll
covenants.description: Instantly cast Holy Shock, Avenger's Shield, or Judgment on up to 5 targets within 30 yds (based on your current specialization).

covenants.name: Blessing of Summer
covenants.description:
Bless an ally for 30 sec, causing their attacks to have a 40% chance to deal 30% additional damage as Holy.

<dynamic>Blessing of the Seasons:</dynamic> Turns to Autumn after use.

covenants.name: Blessing of Autumn
covenants.description:
Bless an ally for 30 sec, causing their cooldowns to recover 30% faster.

<dynamic>Blessing of the Seasons:</dynamic> Turns to Winter after use.

covenants.name: Blessing of Winter
covenants.description:
Bless an ally for 30 sec. Their attacks deal [5 / 100 * max(Attack power, Spell power) * (1 + Versatility)] Frost damage and reduce enemies' movement speed by 3% and attack speed by 2%, stacking 10 times.

<dynamic>Blessing of the Seasons:</dynamic> Turns to Spring after use.

covenants.name: Blessing of Spring
covenants.description:
Bless an ally for 30 sec, increasing their healing done by 10% and healing received by 20%.

<dynamic>Blessing of the Seasons:</dynamic> Turns to Summer after use.

covenants.name: Vanquisher's Hammer
covenants.description:
Throws a hammer at your target dealing (112% of Spell power) Shadow damage, and empowering your next 

<spec>Retribution</spec>
<dynamic>Templar's Verdict to automatically trigger Divine Storm</dynamic>

<spec>Holy</spec>
<dynamic>Word of Glory to automatically trigger Light of Dawn</dynamic>

<spec>Protection</spec>
<dynamic>Word of Glory to automatically trigger Shield of the Righteous</dynamic>

covenants.name: Ashen Hallow
covenants.description:
Hallow the target area for 30 sec. Enemies in the area suffer up to [(55% of Spell power) * 30 / 2] Shadow damage, and allies are healed for up to [(42% of Spell power) * 30 / 2], reduced if there are more than 5 targets.

Within the Hallow, you may use Hammer of Wrath on any target, and its damage is increased by 100%.

legendaries.name: Maraad's Dying Breath
legendaries.description: Healing with Light of Dawn causes your next Light of the Martyr to also heal your Beacon of Light. Each ally healed by Light of Dawn increases Light of the Martyr healing by 10%.

legendaries.name: Final Verdict
legendaries.description: Replaces Templar's Verdict with Final Verdict, a devastating strike that deals (194% of Attack power) Holy damage. Has a 50% chance to activate Hammer of Wrath and reset its cooldown.

legendaries.name: Tempest of the Lightbringer
legendaries.description:
Projects Divine Storm forward 20 yds, damaging all enemies in its path.

Also increases damage dealt by Divine Storm by 20%.

legendaries.name: Relentless Inquisitor
legendaries.description: Spending Holy Power grants you 1% haste per finisher for 12 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

legendaries.name: The Mad Paragon
legendaries.description: Hammer of Wrath extends Avenging Wrath by 1 sec and deals 25% additional damage.

legendaries.name: Uther's Devotion
legendaries.description:
Your Blessing of Freedom

<condition>Blessing of Sacrifice</condition>
<dynamic> Blessing of Sacrifice</dynamic>

 and 

<condition>Blessing of Spellwarding</condition>
<dynamic>Blessing of Spellwarding</dynamic>

Blessing of Protection cooldowns are reduced by 1 sec per Holy Power spent.

legendaries.name: Vanguard's Momentum
legendaries.description: Hammer of Wrath has 2 extra charges, and increases the damage of your next Holy Power spender by 10%.

legendaries.name: The Magistrate's Judgment
legendaries.description: Judgment has a 60% chance to reduce the cost of your next Holy Power spender by 1.

legendaries.name: From Dusk till Dawn
legendaries.description:
When you reach 5 Holy Power, you gain Blessing of Dawn. When you reach 0 Holy Power, you gain Blessing of Dusk.

<dynamic>Blessing of Dawn</dynamic>
<dynamic>Damage and healing increased by 6% for 10 sec.</dynamic>

<dynamic>Blessing of Dusk</dynamic>
<dynamic>Damage taken reduced by 6% for 10 sec.</dynamic>

legendaries.name: Inflorescence of the Sunwell
legendaries.description: Infusion of Light has 1 additional charge and its effects are increased by 20%.

legendaries.name: Shadowbreaker, Dawn of the Sun
legendaries.description: Light of Dawn's range is increased to 40 yards, and all allies inside your Light of Dawn receive 20% increased healing from your spells for 6 sec.

legendaries.name: Shock Barrier
legendaries.description: Holy Shock protects the target with a shield of Holy Light for 18 sec, absorbing up to (32 / 100 * Spell power) damage every 6 sec. Can protect up to 3 targets.

legendaries.name: Holy Avenger's Engraved Sigil
legendaries.description: Your Avenger's Shield has a 50% chance to have its cooldown instantly reset when used.

legendaries.name: The Ardent Protector's Sanctum
legendaries.description: Reduces damage taken while Ardent Defender is active by an additional 10%, and when you activate Ardent Defender, it will also apply to the nearest ally within 15 yards.

legendaries.name: Bulwark of Righteous Fury
legendaries.description: Each target hit by Avenger's Shield increases the damage of your next Shield of the Righteous by 30%.

legendaries.name: Reign of Endless Kings
legendaries.description: When you drop below 20% health, you become infused with Guardian of the Ancient Kings for 4 sec. This cannot occur again for 45 sec.
